org.drip.math.common

Class FormatUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.math.common.FormatUtil

  • public class FormatUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements formatting utility functions.

      FormatUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String FormatDouble(double dblValue)
      Format the double input by multiplying by 100, then justifies the left and the right by 1 and 3 zeros
      static java.lang.String FormatDouble(double dblValue, double dblMultiplier)
      Format the double input by the multiplier, then justifies the left and the right by 1 and 3 zeros
      static java.lang.String FormatDouble(double dblValue, int iNumLeft, int iNumRight, double dblMultiplier)
      Format the double input by multiplying, and then adding left and right adjustments
      static java.lang.String FormatPrice(double dblPrice)
      Format the double input by multiplying by 100, then justifies the left and the right by 2 and 3 zeros
      static java.lang.String FormatPrice(double dblPrice, int iNumLeft, int iNumRight, double dblMultiplier)
      Format the double input by multiplying, and then adding left and right adjustments
      static java.lang.String FormatSpread(double dblSpread)
      Format the double input by multiplying by 10000, no justification
      static java.lang.String PrePad(int i)
      Pre-pad a single digit integer with zeros
